1370: Wedeghe was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Soeten at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Lost son Strom when Strom was 0 years old.
Soeten gave birth to their stillborn son Strom in 1371.
1374: Had a daughter with Soeten, Amalburga, at age 22.
1376: Had a son with Soeten, Wlfarde, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Soeten, Mabelie, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Soeten, Aleydis, at age 26.
1379: Had a son with Soeten, Eltetus, at age 27.
1384: Had a daughter with Soeten, Salome, at age 32.
1385: Lost his wife Soeten while she was giving birth to Abelkijn in 1385.
